overwriteQuestion: Are you sure you want to continue? Your currently edited resume will be overwritten.

professional.title: Professional
professional.description: Two column template in blue colors. Fresh and professional.

serious.title: Serious
serious.description: Two column black and white template. Serious and old-school.

lax.title: Lax
lax.description: Two column template with some green accents. Light and fresh.

energetic.title: Energetic
energetic.description: Single column template with some violet accents. Energetic and modern.

peachy.title: Peachy
peachy.description: Single column template using orange color. Safe and clean.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Simple column template with blue accents. Straightforward and oldschool.

cookies.content: We use Google Analytics to see how we can improve services. <0>We do not collect any data used for creating resumes, it doesn't leave your device.</0> By clicking "Accept", you agree to the use of cookies as described in our <1>Privacy policy</1>. It is ok to reject them.
